title: Did Merrick Garland call Bill Bar Liar during the confirmation hearing?
subtitle: A viral tweet that she claims to be quoting a tense exchange between the Attorney General of Piden and Sun, the Republican Tom Cotton.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The former Attorney General, Merrick Garland, called Bill Bar "a liar," or words in that regard, during a Senate hearing in February 2021.
